question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. white van
B. airplane
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white van and airplane are both in the background, and their relative depth is ambiguous without a depth map or clear perspective cues to determine which is closer.
